#include "commo.h"
#include "../rcc/graph.h"
#include "../rcc/graph_marshaler.h"
#include "../command.h"
#include "../procedure.h"
#include "../command_marshaler.h"
#include "raft_rpc.h"
#include "macros.h"

namespace janus {

RaftCommo::RaftCommo(PollMgr* poll) : Communicator(poll) {
}

//void
shared_ptr<IntEvent>
RaftCommo::SendRequestVote(parid_t par_id,
                                siteid_t site_id,
                                int64_t term,
                                int64_t candidateId,
                                int64_t lastLogIdx,
                                int64_t lastLogTerm,
                                int64_t* curTerm,
                                bool_t* voteGranted) {
  /*
   * Example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [curTerm, voteGranted, ev](Future* fu) {
        /* this is a handler that will be invoked when the RPC returns */
        //uint64_t curTerm;
        //bool_t voteGranted;
        /* retrieve RPC return values in order */
        fu->get_reply() >> *curTerm;
        fu->get_reply() >> *voteGranted;

        if(ev->status_ != Event::TIMEOUT)
          ev->Set(1);
        /* process the RPC response here */
      };
      /* Always use Call_Async(proxy, RPC name, RPC args..., fuattr)
      * to asynchronously invoke RPCs */
      Log_debug("Call Async for Server id:%d",p.first);
      // Log_debug("LastlogIndex %d, Lastlogterm :%d",lastLogIdx, lastLogTerm);
      Call_Async(proxy, RequestVote, term, candidateId, lastLogIdx, lastLogTerm, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}

//void
shared_ptr<IntEvent>
RaftCommo::SendAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                                  siteid_t site_id,
                                  int64_t term,
                                  int64_t leaderId,
                                  int64_t prevLogIdx,
                                  int64_t prevLogTerm,
                                  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd,
                                  int64_t logidx,
                                  int64_t logterm,
                                  //string log,
                                  int64_t commitIdx,
                                  int64_t* curTerm,
                                  bool_t* followerAppendOK,
                                  int64_t* logMismatchIdx,
                                  int64_t* logMismatchTerm) {
  /*
   * More example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [curTerm, followerAppendOK, logMismatchIdx, logMismatchTerm, ev](Future* fu) {
        //uint64_t curTerm;
        //bool_t followerAppendOK;
        fu->get_reply() >> *curTerm;
        fu->get_reply() >> *followerAppendOK;
        fu->get_reply() >> *logMismatchIdx;
        fu->get_reply() >> *logMismatchTerm;

        if(ev->status_ != Event::TIMEOUT)
          ev->Set(2);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      //Log_debug("Commented MarshallDeputy");
      MarshallDeputy md(cmd);
      //md = NULL;
      Call_Async(proxy, AppendEntries, term, leaderId, prevLogIdx, prevLogTerm, md, logidx, logterm, commitIdx, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}

//void
shared_ptr<IntEvent>


RaftCommo::EmptyAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                                  siteid_t site_id,
                                  int64_t term,
                                  int64_t leaderId,
                                  int64_t prevLogIdx,
                                  int64_t prevLogTerm,
                                  //shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd,
                                  string log,
                                  int64_t commitIdx,
                                  int64_t* curTerm,
                                  bool_t* followerAppendOK,
                                  int64_t* logMismatchIdx,
                                  int64_t* logMismatchTerm) {
  /*
   * More example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [curTerm, followerAppendOK, logMismatchIdx, logMismatchTerm, ev](Future* fu) {
        //uint64_t curTerm1;
        //bool_t followerAppendOK1;
        fu->get_reply() >> *curTerm;
        fu->get_reply() >> *followerAppendOK;


        fu->get_reply() >> *logMismatchIdx;
        fu->get_reply() >> *logMismatchTerm;
        //*curTerm = curTerm1;
        //*followerAppendOK = followerAppendOK1;
        if(ev->status_ != Event::TIMEOUT)
          ev->Set(3);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      //Log_debug("Commented MarshallDeputy");
      //MarshallDeputy md(cmd);
      //md = NULL;
      Call_Async(proxy, EmptyAppendEntries, term, leaderId, prevLogIdx, prevLogTerm, log, commitIdx, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> 
RaftCommo::SendString(parid_t par_id, siteid_t site_id, const string& msg, string* res) {
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first != site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [res,ev](Future* fu) {
        fu->get_reply() >> *res;
        ev->Set(1);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      Call_Async(proxy, HelloRpc, msg, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}


} // namespace janus
